Literature.Title: The novel β-hairpin antimicrobial peptide D-G(RF)3 demonstrates exceptional antibacterial efficacy
Literature.Author: Li B, Liu Y, Yan P, Ouyang X, Ba Z, Wang Y, Yang T, Yu Z, Ren B, Zhong C, Liu H, Zhang Y, Gou S, Ni J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=32µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=4µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=64µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=32µM)
